ModuleDescription:
The process of political communication has been
undergoing transformation across the world through
the rise of digital media. The transformation is also the
result of the way established institutions, including
political parties and news organization, have changed,
and the ways citizens are engaging with politics and
media. The paper is designed to introduce students to
the field of political communication â€“ an
interdisciplinary field of study. It will also help students
to understand contemporary challenges and
opportunities.
